text: Pros Flexible Understanding Fun Hardworking Challenging This company is filled with smart, interesting, fun, ambitious people. From the CEOs to the interns, Werk practices what it preaches, putting its employees first and offering multiple types of flexibility to allow workers to succeed inside and outside the office. Everyone is passionate about the work and about creating a new way of working. Cons Werk is an early stage start-up so you have to be comfortable with all that that entails, changing projects as the company develops and helping each other out!
title: Amazing place to work—practices what they preach!
